languages.text: "Я действительно посетил многие места, приведенные к свету Императора... и подернутые скверной {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Признаться, даже спустя все эти годы, побывав в разных концах Империума и заглянув за его пределы, я все еще считаю Сегментум Соляр величайшим из оплотов Человечества. Ничто не сравнится с величием {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Святой Терры{/g}, могуществом {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Марса{/g} и грандиозностью иных миров этого сегмента".

traits.locale_text: "Едва ли весь Империум, но я действительно посетил многие из мест, овеянные славой Императора... и подернутые скверной его извечных врагов. Признаться, даже спустя все эти годы, побывав в разных концах Империума и даже заглянув за его пределы, я все еще считаю Сегментум Соляр величайшим из оплотов Человечества. Ничто не сравнится с величием священной Терры, могуществом Марса и грандиозностью иных миров этого сегмента".

languages.text: "Indeed. I have visited many of the places brought to the Emperor's light... and those sullied by the filth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In truth, even after all these years spent visiting the various corners of the Imperium and looking beyond its borders, I still consider the Segmentum Solar to be the greatest of all Humanity's bastions. Nothing compares to the majesty of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, the might of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, the grandeur of the segment's other worlds."
languages.original_text: "Я действительно посетил многие места, приведенные к свету Императора... и подернутые скверной {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Архиврага{/g}. Признаться, даже спустя все эти годы, побывав в разных концах Империума и заглянув за его пределы, я все еще считаю Сегментум Соляр величайшим из оплотов Человечества. Ничто не сравнится с величием {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Святой Терры{/g}, могуществом {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Марса{/g} и грандиозностью иных миров этого сегмента".

traits.locale_text: "Everywhere in the Imperium? Unlikely. But I have visited many of the places graced by the Emperor's glory... and those sullied by the filth of the Archenemy. In truth, even after all these years spent visiting the various corners of the Imperium and looking beyond its borders, I still consider the Segmentum Solar to be the greatest of all Mankind's bastions. Nothing compares to the majesty of sacred Terra, the might of Mars, the grandeur of the segment's other worlds."

"Indeed. I have visited many of the places brought to Emperor's light... and those sullied by the filth of the Archenemy. In truth, even after all these years spent visiting the various corners of the Imperium and looking beyond its borders, I still consider the Segmentum Solar to be the greatest of all Mankind's bastions. Nothing compares to the majesty of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, the might of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, the grandeur of the segment's other worlds."

"Everywhere in the Imperium? Unlikely. But I have visited many of the places graced by the Emperor's glory... and those sullied by the filth of the Archenemy. In truth, even after all these years spent visiting the various corners of the Imperium and looking beyond its borders, I still consider the Segmentum Solar to be the greatest of all Mankind's bastions. Nothing compares to the majesty of sacred Terra, the might of Mars, the grandeur of the segment's other worlds."

"Indeed. I have visited many of the places brought to the Emperor's light... and those sullied by the filth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In truth, even after all these years spent visiting the various corners of the Imperium and looking beyond its borders, I still consider the Segmentum Solar to be the greatest of all Humanity's bastions. Nothing compares to the majesty of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, the might of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, the grandeur of the segment's other worlds."

languages.text: “的确如此，我去过许多被帝皇之光照耀的地方……还有很多被{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的污秽所玷污的地方。这些年来，我造访过帝国的各个角落，还见过帝国边界之外的许多区域，而我至今依然认为，在人类所有的堡垒之中，太阳星域是最伟大的堡垒。没有任何事物能比得上雄伟的{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}神圣泰拉{/g}，或是强大的{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}，或是那片星域中的其他世界。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. I have visited many of the places brought to the Emperor's light... and those sullied by the filth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In truth, even after all these years spent visiting the various corners of the Imperium and looking beyond its borders, I still consider the Segmentum Solar to be the greatest of all Humanity's bastions. Nothing compares to the majesty of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, the might of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, the grandeur of the segment's other worlds."

traits.locale_text: “的确如此，我去过许多被帝皇之光照耀的地方……还有很多被{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}混沌大敌{/g}的污秽所玷污的地方。这些年来，我造访过帝国的各个角落，还见过帝国边界之外的许多区域，而我至今依然认为，在人类所有的堡垒之中，太阳星域是最伟大的堡垒。没有任何事物能比得上雄伟的{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}神圣泰拉{/g}，或是强大的{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}，或是那片星域中的其他世界。”

languages.original_text: "Indeed. I have visited many of the places brought to the Emperor's light... and those sullied by the filth of the Archenemy. In truth, even after all these years spent visiting the various corners of the Imperium and looking beyond its borders, I still consider the Segmentum Solar to be the greatest of all Humanity's bastions. Nothing compares to the majesty of Holy Terra, the might of Mars, the grandeur of the segment's other worlds."

languages.text: «En efecto. He visitado muchos de los lugares iluminados por la luz del Emperador... y otros mancillados por la vileza del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. En verdad, incluso tras todos estos años viajando por los recovecos del Imperium y explorando más allá de sus fronteras, aún considero el Segmentum Solar el mayor de los bastiones de la Humanidad. Nada puede compararse con la majestuosidad de la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sagrada Terra{/g}, el poder de {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Marte{/g} ni la grandeza de los otros mundos del segmento».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. I have visited many of the places brought to the Emperor's light... and those sullied by the filth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In truth, even after all these years spent visiting the various corners of the Imperium and looking beyond its borders, I still consider the Segmentum Solar to be the greatest of all Humanity's bastions. Nothing compares to the majesty of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, the might of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, the grandeur of the segment's other worlds."

traits.locale_text: «En efecto. He visitado muchos de los lugares iluminados por la luz del Emperador... y otros mancillados por la vileza del {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archienemigo{/g}. En verdad, incluso tras todos estos años viajando por los recovecos del Imperium y explorando más allá de sus fronteras, aún considero el Segmentum Solar el mayor de los bastiones de la Humanidad. Nada puede compararse con la majestuosidad de la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sagrada Terra{/g}, el poder de {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Marte{/g} ni la grandeza de los otros mundos del segmento».

languages.text: 「そうだ。私は皇帝の光を浴びた多くの場所を訪れてきた…そして、穢らわしき{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}によって汚された場所も。実際、帝国のさまざまな場所を訪れ、その国境を越えて何年経っても、私は〈日輪の宙域〉（セグムントゥム・ソーラー）が人類の砦の中で最も偉大だと考えている。{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}聖なる地球{/g}の威厳、力強き{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}、宙域の他の惑星の壮大さに匹敵するものはない」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. I have visited many of the places brought to the Emperor's light... and those sullied by the filth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In truth, even after all these years spent visiting the various corners of the Imperium and looking beyond its borders, I still consider the Segmentum Solar to be the greatest of all Humanity's bastions. Nothing compares to the majesty of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, the might of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, the grandeur of the segment's other worlds."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ。私は皇帝の光を浴びた多くの場所を訪れてきた…そして、穢らわしき{g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}渾沌の勢力{/g}によって汚された場所も。実際、帝国のさまざまな場所を訪れ、その国境を越えて何年経っても、私は〈日輪の宙域〉（セグムントゥム・ソーラー）が人類の砦の中で最も偉大だと考えている。{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}聖なる地球{/g}の威厳、力強き{g|Encyclopedia:Mars}火星{/g}、宙域の他の惑星の壮大さに匹敵するものはない」

languages.text: "In der Tat. Ich habe viele der Orte besucht, die ans Licht des Imperators gebracht wurden ... und auch solche, die vom Schmutz des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} besudelt wurden. Offen gestanden: Auch wenn ich endlose Jahre lang die verschiedenen Winkel des Imperiums bereist und auch über seine Grenzen hinausgeblickt habe, halte ich das Segmentum Solar noch immer für die größte Bastion der Menschheit. Nichts lässt sich mit dem majestätischen Anblick des {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Heiligen Terra{/g} vergleichen, mit der Macht des {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, mit der Erhabenheit der anderen Welten des Segments."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. I have visited many of the places brought to the Emperor's light... and those sullied by the filth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In truth, even after all these years spent visiting the various corners of the Imperium and looking beyond its borders, I still consider the Segmentum Solar to be the greatest of all Humanity's bastions. Nothing compares to the majesty of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, the might of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, the grandeur of the segment's other worlds."

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat. Ich habe viele der Orte besucht, die ans Licht des Imperators gebracht wurden ... und auch solche, die vom Schmutz des {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Erzfeinds{/g} besudelt wurden. Offen gestanden: Auch wenn ich endlose Jahre lang die verschiedenen Winkel des Imperiums bereist und auch über seine Grenzen hinausgeblickt habe, halte ich das Segmentum Solar noch immer für die größte Bastion der Menschheit. Nichts lässt sich mit dem majestätischen Anblick des {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Heiligen Terra{/g} vergleichen, mit der Macht des {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, mit der Erhabenheit der anderen Welten des Segments."

languages.text: « En effet. Je me suis rendu sur bon nombre de mondes vivant dans la lumière de l'Empereur... et d'autres corrompus par la souillure du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}. Mais pour être tout à fait honnête, même après avoir passé toutes ces années à voyager aux quatre coins de l'Imperium et à regarder par-delà ses frontières, le Segmentum Solar reste pour moi le plus grand bastion de l'humanité. Rien n'égale la majesté de la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sainte Terra{/g}, la puissance de {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g} ou la grandeur des autres mondes du segment. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. I have visited many of the places brought to the Emperor's light... and those sullied by the filth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In truth, even after all these years spent visiting the various corners of the Imperium and looking beyond its borders, I still consider the Segmentum Solar to be the greatest of all Humanity's bastions. Nothing compares to the majesty of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, the might of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, the grandeur of the segment's other worlds."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Je me suis rendu sur bon nombre de mondes vivant dans la lumière de l'Empereur... et d'autres corrompus par la souillure du {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Grand Ennemi{/g}. Mais pour être tout à fait honnête, même après avoir passé toutes ces années à voyager aux quatre coins de l'Imperium et à regarder par-delà ses frontières, le Segmentum Solar reste pour moi le plus grand bastion de l'humanité. Rien n'égale la majesté de la {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Sainte Terra{/g}, la puissance de {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g} ou la grandeur des autres mondes du segment. »

languages.text: "Öyle. İmparator'un ışığının vurduğu yerlere de gittim... {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı'nın{/g} pisliğine bulanmış yerlere de. Doğrusu, İmparatorluk'un dört bir yanını gezip sınırlarının ötesine de bakmış biri olarak Segmentum Solar, İnsanlığın en muazzam kalesi diyorum. {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Kutsal Terra'nın{/g} haşmetiyle, {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars'ın{/g} kudretiyle... Segmentin diğer dünyalarının ihtişamıyla hiçbir şey boy ölçüşemez."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. I have visited many of the places brought to the Emperor's light... and those sullied by the filth of the {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Archenemy{/g}. In truth, even after all these years spent visiting the various corners of the Imperium and looking beyond its borders, I still consider the Segmentum Solar to be the greatest of all Humanity's bastions. Nothing compares to the majesty of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Holy Terra{/g}, the might of {g|Encyclopedia:Mars}Mars{/g}, the grandeur of the segment's other worlds."

traits.locale_text: "Öyle. İmparator'un ışığının vurduğu yerlere de gittim... {g|Encyclopedia:Chaos}Şerbaşı{/g}'nın pisliğine bulanmış yerlere de. Segmentin diğer dünyalarının ihtişamıyla hiçbir şey boy ölçüşemez."
